title: Iraq is committed to the production adjustment agreement reached in April – Acting Oil Minister
description: Vienna, Austria, 14 May 2020--Iraq’s Minister of Finance and Acting Oil Minister, Dr Ali Alawi, emphasised in a statement Iraq’s commitment to the voluntary production adjustment agreement reached at the 9th and 10th (Extraordinary) OPEC and non-OPEC Ministerial Meetings held on 9 and 12 April respectively via videoconference.
